metadata.title: CVE-2021-21443 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Agents are able to list customer user emails without required permissions in the bulk action screen. This issue affects: OTRS AG ((OTRS)) Community Edition: 6.0.x version 6.0.1 and later versions. OTRS AG OTRS: 7.0.x versions prior to 7.0.27.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
